title: Enhancing Healthcare Practical Competencies: Friction Factor Analysis and Strategy Development for Promoting Organizational Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify and analyze friction factors between organizational structures
Learners can evaluate the impact of friction factors on the learning process through case studies
Learners can design organizational learning strategies to resolve friction in VR-based simulations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
